channel.title: CVE Feed for Socomec -- MODULYS GP (MOD3GP-SY-120K)

item.title: CVE-2023-41084|2024-07-11T19:25:52.186Z -- socomec -- modulys%20gp%20%28mod3gp-sy-120k%29
item.description: Session management within the web application is incorrect and allows attackers to steal session cookies to perform a multitude of actions that the web app allows on the device.
